text: War of God or Hong Kong Calamity is an 1976 Taiwanese-Hong Kong movie. It is science fiction, fantasy, and action movie. Chun Hongmyin directed it. It was produced by Hsing Hua Film Production Company. War of God was released in Taiwanese by July 24, 1976. Koichi Takano built the special effects. ==Plot== A sculptor named, Mr. Chao makes a statue of the god Guan Yu to fight large space aliens that are attacking Hong Kong. ==Cast== * Yu Ming Lun as Chao Chun * Tse Ling-Ling as Li Yu * Cindy Tang Hsin as Chun Lan * Yu-Hsin Chen as Mr. Chao * Fei Lung as Guan Yu ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1976 science fiction movies Category:1976 fantasy movies Category:Taiwanese movies Category:Hong Kong science fiction movies Category:Hong Kong fantasy movies Category:1970s monster movies
title: War of God (1976 movie)
